name: Exp_SCADA_Red_Pnt_Add_EPRSC10K
action: <* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(Exp_Ent_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-RSC10K)*>[IF]([GT](<*eval(Int(Fix(<*VALUE(Experion SCADA Points (0 - 300000))*>/10000)))*>,0)){<*SETATVQTY(Exp_Ent_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-RSC10K, <*eval(Int(Fix(<*VALUE(Experion SCADA Points (0 - 300000))*>/10000)))*>)*>}{0}[ENDIF]<* DoResetAtt *>
